verbs.description: [ARG0: A new poll out Tuesday] [V: found] [ARG1: 41 % of Americans approved of President Trump ’s job performance in April , despite a vast majority labeling his approach as “ unconventional] . " The Monmouth University Polling Institute conducted the poll of 800 adults over four days last week .
